name: City Defense
description:
In City Defense you need to protect your city from being captured by enemy vehicles.
To do this, you can build 3 types of automatic turrets that have their own unique characteristics and use different
ways to destroy the enemy. But do not forget to upgrade your turrets, then they will do more damage and continue shooting!

Fierce battles take place at 15 locations, ranging from urban areas and ending with a spacious suburb.
Many elements of the game, including enemy routes, are randomly generated “on the go,” which results in a unique experience from each game session.

Get paid for the destruction of enemies. After all, they can build new turrets or pump old ones, as well as buy time rollbacks. Careful study of the features of locations and types of enemies will teach
on the go make the right strategic decisions.

Game Review.

Fierce battles take place at 15 unique locations, ranging from urban areas and ending with a spacious suburb.
Many elements of the game, including enemy routes, are randomly generated and give a unique experience from each game.

Earn money by destroying your enemies. They can buy unwinding of time, build new turrets or pump old ones.
Careful study of the features of locations and types of enemies will teach you to make right decisions on the go.


Features:

- "Rollback" time back! But it acts only on enemies, and you will have time to destroy them!

- Create unique turrets to defend your city!

- Different levels of difficulty

- 22 types of enemy vehicles with their own unique characteristics


Build the perfect defense! Do not let them pass! Do not give up to the last!
